name: intro-to-api-testing
description: | #   | Test name                                                 | Should receive code | Received code | Status | | --- |-----------------------------------------------------------| ------------------- | ------------- | ------ | | 1   | Get test orders with correct data                         | 200                 | 200           | Passed | | 2   | Get test orders with correct similar data                 | 200                 | 200           | Passed | | 3   | Get test orders with username and password equals 0       | 400                 | 200           | Failed | | 4   | Get test orders with data contains specific symbols       | 400                 | 200           | Failed | | 5   | Get test orders with password in float type               | 400                 | 200           | Failed | | 6   | Get test orders with string username and numbers password | 200                 | 200           | Passed | | 7   | Get test orders without required parameter password       | 500                 | 500           | Passed | | 8   | Get test orders without required parameter username       | 500                 | 500           | Passed | | 9   | Get test orders with password = &                         | 500                 | 200           | Failed | | 10  | Get test orders when parameters = numbers                 | 500                 | 200           | Failed | | 11  | Get test orders with parameters = string                  | 500                 | 200           | Failed | | 12  | Get test orders when username and password are missing    | 500                 | 500           | Passed |
